org.ecoinformatics.seek.datasource.eml.eml2

Class EML2MetadataSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid.MetadataSpecificationInterface
      • org.ecoinformatics.seek.datasource.eml.eml2.EML2MetadataSpecification
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EML201MetadataSpecification, EML210MetadataSpecification, EML211MetadataSpecification

    public class EML2MetadataSpecification
extends MetadataSpecificationInterface
    This class is a plugin for eml200 namespace to transfer query group to ecogrid query type. It also provide a method to create quick search query
    Author:
    Jing Tao

      • transformResultset

        public ResultRecord[] transformResultset(org.ecoinformatics.ecogrid.queryservice.resultset.ResultsetType results,
                                         java.lang.String endpoint,
                                         CompositeEntity container)
                                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                         java.io.IOException,
                                         EcoGridException,
                                         NameDuplicationException,
                                         IllegalActionException
        This method will transfer ResultsetType java object to array of ResultRecord java object. The ResultRecord object can be shown in kepler. If the results is null or there is no record in the result, null will be return
        Parameters:
        ResultsetType - results the result need to be transform
        String - endpoints the search end point
        Returns:
        ResultRecord[] the resultrecord need be returned.
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        EcoGridException
        NameDuplicationException
        IllegalActionException
